General.Name: LleidaNetworks Serveis Telemàtics S.A
General.Description: LleidaNetworks Serveis Telemàtics, S.A. operates as a teleoperator for short message management services over the internet in Spain and internationally. The company is also involved in the dissemination of telematics systems; provision, organization, and commercialization of telecommunication services; program development; sending text messages and electronic mail; provision of study services and analysis of computer processes; provision of consultancy and advisory services; and creation, generation, and exploitation of information and communication technologies. In addition, it provides VAS services, including SMS, MMS, UMS, and other types of messaging. LleidaNetworks Serveis Telemàtics, S.A. was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

4.Name: Ms. Beatriz  García Torre
4.Title: Head of Interconnection Officer & Exec. Director
